name: Iris (gensuta)
description:
Life is hard and high school can be extremely difficult with the drama it brings for Iris.

She's having trouble adapting and moving on.
She's having trouble staying strong and calm while dealing with the possibilities of fake friends and the like.
She keeps having nightmares about her issues.
She thinks things can get better...but that's only if she tries to make it better and doesn't give up on herself.

As you play the game you will have to make choices quickly as well as make sure your "Anxiety meter" doesn't fill up. There are a total 7 endings!
4 bad endings, one neutral ending, one good, and one true ending.

Content warnings: This game includes lots of swearing, anxiety and suicide.

If you like the game, have a comment or find a bug/typo  feel free to comment below!
All art, music, etc. was created by yours truly.
( I'm sorry in advance if there are any typos!!! I've been staring at this script for quite a while and was too shy to ask to get some beta testers;;; )

KNOWN BUGS

- The anxiety meter glitches sometimes???
(as in the image. you won't randomly get a game over don't worry)
